short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides song names from Spotify/YouTube/Yandex Music page to Twitch chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If a Twitch and a Spotify/Youtube/Yandex Music tabs are both open, then the "!song" message in the Twitch chat will automatically send a song name from the music tab.
